articles.author: Vince Rugari
articles.title: As it happened: Real Madrid prove too strong for Celtic - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Celtic have gone down swinging against the European champions, losing 3-0 to Real Madrid in Ange Postecoglou’s UEFA Champions League debut.
articles.content:
A deflated Ange Postecoglou has just spoken to Stan Sports Mark Pougatch:
We understand at this level, its fine margins, he said.
The first goal was always going to be important, I thought right up… [+812 chars]

articles.title: Liverpool star Thiago is IN the travelling squad for Champions League trip to Napoli on Wednesday - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Reds travel to Napoli to face Luciano Spalletti's side at the Diego Armando Maradona Stadium in their first European group-stage game this season, and the return of Thiago from injury is a massive boost.
articles.content:
